meanings.sent1: She changed her hairstyle for a new look.
meanings.sent2: The weather changed from sunny to rainy.
meanings.sent3: The cat changed its mind about going outside when it started to rain.
meanings.sent4: His perspective on life changed after traveling to different countries.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar changed into a beautiful butterfly.

meanings.sent1: He changed the flat tire with a spare one.
meanings.sent2: She changed her old phone with a new model.
meanings.sent3: The magician changed the rabbit into a hat.
meanings.sent4: The actor changed his costume for the next scene.
meanings.sent5: The teacher changed the seating arrangement in the classroom.
